metadata.title: CVE-2017-12108 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists in thexls_preparseWorkSheet function of libxls 1.4 when handling a MULBLANKrecord. A specially crafted XLS file can cause a memory corruptionresulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send malicious XLS fileto trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: r-cran-readxl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
